extendedInfo.description: ************************************************************TaskBot is a minimalist To-do app with an intuitive and awesome-looking user interface.************************************************************Main Features:- Smart Mode- Speech to text- Notification for Tasks due today and/or overdue Tasks- Inspirational Quotes- Choose different Fonts for your To-Dos. (Menu > Choose Font)- Different Themes for UI- No Ads- Password Protection- Sorting To-Dos automatically- Different Sorting Options- Due Dates- You can check off your To-Dos from widget- Elegant and simple UI without all unnecessary details.(If you don't believe me check out the screenshots ^^)- Medium and Large widgetsTaskBot aims to be the most intuitive and elegant looking To-Do app on Android without sacrificing features.Widgets only work if you have android 2.2 or aboveNeed Support? Use FeedBack option in TaskBot and I will help as soon as possible :)

reviews.title: Exactly what I was looking for, except....
reviews.comment: Very tiny fonts. Any way of making then look bigger? Very nice and simple looking widget. Easy to click a task as done, one click will do. No permissions, yay!
reviews.author: Maureen Tay

reviews.title: Zii
reviews.comment: This is great. How could anyone not rate this app 5 stars? It\'s much more simply and more appealing to the eye than any other task app I\'ve ever used. Keep up the good work!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: sweeeet
reviews.comment: Fast, simple, intuitive, great ux!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: widgets too big
reviews.comment: I think I would have really liked app if there were options for smaller widgets!  Otherwise, uninstalled.
reviews.author: jon doh

reviews.title: Recurrent task
reviews.comment: I don\'t want to join Google+ actually.But I had to, to rate this awesome app. I think it will be great to add option for recurrent task. I wish I could give you 6 stars. :)
reviews.author: Silviana Dewi

reviews.title: promissing task list but many missing features
reviews.comment: nice UI design and widget but missing features: per task notification time, calendar date-picker, custom notification sound settings
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Crap.
reviews.comment: Theme is useless if it doesn\'t theme the widget. No one cares what a program looks like. They do, however, care about being able to have their widgets match the rest of their stuff. Uninstalled.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: And It\'s All FREE
reviews.comment: This app is amazing not only because it\'s free, but because it performs so many functions without a huge size. I just looked at an identical app that was 2MB+ and the features were identical. And the real bonus lies in that this is a \"Stand-Alone\" app requiring no permissions! Overall a great app for solo tasks or task you don\'t need on your calendar. Very impressive.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Very Good
reviews.comment: It\'s so nearly what I was looking for and I would definitely use it with one addition - syncing with google tasks.  Thanks.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: No backup.
reviews.comment: Love the customizatlble fonts & themes.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Nice app with no spcial permission
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Perfect App
reviews.comment: The most friendly permissions.  Looking forward to being able to set the time for each task individually.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Promising app
reviews.comment: Nice lightweight app with clean interface & minimal permission requirements (yay). Small bug when ticking tasks off & quotes which don\'t add anything (for me) means 1 star off.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Simple and nice.
reviews.comment: A very nice and convenient light app.
reviews.author: Alvin Wong Vee Lin

reviews.comment: Without sync is a pity
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Please apply themes to widget,and add some girly themes.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Love it
reviews.comment: Functional, elegant, and minimalistic. Noting else like it on the marketplace. No silly share buttons, no camera function. Just a good looking and easy to use task manager
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Good!
reviews.comment: Simple...effective...easy.  Would love to see more customization on notification date and time for each individual task.  More themes please!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Decent UI, minimalistic
reviews.comment: I\'ve been looking for a to do list with free widget and decent UI. This app is the one.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Not bad but..
reviews.comment: This app is missing a key feature in todo management: individual notifications per task. Daily notifications are useless on days I don\'t have anytasks
reviews.author: A Google User
